numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a pattern near the 85th percentile of income.
2. Near the 85th percentile of income, the advantage decreases.
3. If a person's parents are in that income bracket, then it is harder for the person to get into college.
5. I wonder how the data would vary if the data were collected from only one college.
6. I wonder if some colleges are biased by income.
7. I wonder if some colleges are biased by legacy.
10. This changes the chances that my community gets.
11. Many people live in the Bay Area.
12. The average income in the Bay Area is higher.
13. Many people in the Bay Area will get a higher advantage of getting into college.
14. The title is "Socioeconomic bias in education is not going anywhere".
